Lines: Universal Century 0079. September 26th
After passing MS pilot aptitude test
I received early graduation from academy
and got assigned to a newly established unit.
AFter six month of stalemate
since Zeon Earth Drop operations
war on surface was about to start anew.
Today is 6th Octobore, fateful day.
I was handed my first combat mission
as a platoon leader of newly established
Wide-area Special Response Mobile Suit Team
Commonly known as SRT-1
and will meet my team for first time.
Earth Federation Forces
has begun assembling forces around Warsaw
for upcoming offensive against Odessa
which will begin soon.
On the day of our first battle
we have received new orders from command.
After long stalemate
Federation is finally going on offensive...
Preparations for Operation Odessa
EFF first major counteroffensive
are almost complete.
In order to ensure victory
we must avoid large Zeon forces
to conceal our target to the last moment.
To achieve this
General Revil has deployed MS Teams
our fledling MS Team
for diversionary attacks.
While only experienced teams
were being deployed on the front
we also got mobilized due to
having won two engagements already.
Federation forces participating in
counteroffensive have gathered around Warsaw.
Preparation for Operation Odessa
are proceeding smoothly.
In order to ensure victory
we must avoid large Zeon forces
to conceal our target to the last moment.
To achieve this
General Revil has deployed
our fledling MS Teams
for diversionary attacks.
While only experienced teams
were being deployed on the front
we also got mobilized due to
having won two engagements already.
November 7th.
Operation Odessa has begun.
Large EFF forces gathered around Warsaw
have finally moved out
toward Zeon's mining base in Odessa
Zeon forces, under command of
Major General Yuri Kellerne
fell back to shorten their defense lines
Advance of Federal forces has stopped
and battle became a stalemate for now.
Our unit has been tasked with escort
of reinforcement troops...
Zeon forces have started retreating from Odessa
after realizing EFF had superior numbers.
Many of defeated Zeon units
are retreating toward Africa and Far East.
Although both sides suffered heavy losses
Operation Odessa ended in decisive EFF victory
and military balance on surface
has shifted in Federation favour.
We got assigned patrol duties
to relieve battle weary main forces.
Although we're pretty exhausted too....
Zeon forces have started retreating from Odessa
after realizing EFF had superior numbers.
Many of defeated Zeon units
are retreating toward Africa and Far East.
Although both sides suffered heavy losses
Operation Odessa ended in decisive EFF victory
and military balance on surface
has shifted in Federation favour.
We'll be carrying out a surprise attack
against one group heading toward Far East...
Chain of command of Zeon forces
in Europe has been broken
throwing their forces into confussed
retreat toward still occupied territories.
Finally, small number of MS Teams
recognized for their capabilities
have been released to harras Zeon's retreat.
Our unit is not an exception
we got orders to sortie for mop-up ops.
Eliminating fleeing soldiers...
I don't enjoy doing this
but it has to be done
to bring this war to a close...
On the Far East front
Kojima's Battalion has laid siege
to Zeon's stronghold in Lhasa Base.
After conclusion of Operation Odessa
we were reassigned as escorts
of GunTank artillery units
station in city for bombardment.
Kojima's battlain is a veteran unit
and has been one of the first
to operate EFF new Mobile Suits
so just observing them can teach us a lot.
...At that time we were still celebrating
after crushing success of Operation Odessa
and may have underestimated enemy strength...
November 18th.
Mobile Suit carrier "White Base"
a ship that became EFF legend
has entered port in Belfast Base.
On November 21st...
Zeon Marine Forces assaulted Belfast Base.
Although its defences were defeastated
attack was repelled by White Base MS units.
White Base has already departed
for Federation HQ in Jaburo
and Belfast Base was busy with repairs.
After learning that
Zeon Ground forces are moving again
This time it is up to us to defend Belfast
like White Base did before...
Lhasa Base has fell
after we left the battle.
Apearance of new enemy weapon
has dealt great damage to our forces
but retreating Zeon troops are now cut off.
Unfortunatelly leader of 8th MS Team
has gone missing during final battle...
I wanted to have a long talk with him someday.
I really wish he would survive...
Anyway
this incident remindned us yet again
of lack of experienced MS Teams in EFF forces.
Pilot training seems to be lagging behind
Mobile Suit development and production...
End of November.
We were called to Jaburo
where Federation HQ is located.
At Jaburo, under Vinson Plan, a newly
rebuilt space fleet carying mass produced
Mobile Suits was about to be launched.
It appears we were called as instructors
to share our piloting experience
with newly assembled units.
I was happy to hear
that our efforts thus far
were properly evaluated by HQ.
However...
at same time in California Base
Zeon's largest base on Earth surface
large force was taking off to capture Jaburo
determined to regain initiative in war...
November 30th.
Zeon's landing operation against Jaburo
was reaching its climax.
Zeon takes on numerically superior EFF
determined to fight to the end.
After sacrificing much
some Zeon MS managed to inflitrate Jaburo.
While not much of enemy forces remain
and could be slowly hunted down
we can't afford any damage to rebuilt fleet
least a counterattack in space
will get delayed.
Federation forces are in a tight spot
having to quickly eliminate
all enemy Mobile Suits...
December 2nd.
Rebuilt space fleet has launched from Jaburo.
From now on
space will be main battlefield.
But war on surface is not yet over.
Due to failed assault on Jaburo
Zeon forces has suffered great losses.
Seeing this opportunity
Federation began planning operation against
California Base, Zeon's largest surface base
and Africa, full of Zeon's holdouts
In meantime, our unit
has been tasked with testing
newly developed Mobile Suits
By the time December arrived
Zeon ground forces were virtually disintegrated.
Soldiers were abandoned
without chain of command.
as commanders fleed to space.
Some went into hiding
bidding time until counterattack.
Other wander in search of spaceships
wishing to return to space.
And some struggled to hold the frontline
buying time for troops retreating to Africa.
Around the world, Zeon forces fight for survival...
In meantime, Federation moved its focus to space
launching its newly rebuilt space fleet
and building momentum against Zeon's homeland.
Meanwhile, our unit received new orders...
By the time December arrived
Zeon ground forces were virtually disintegrated.
Soldiers were abandoned
without chain of command.
as commanders fleed to space.
Some went into hiding
bidding time until counterattack.
Other wander in search of spaceships
wishing to return to space.
And some struggled to hold the frontline
buying time for troops retreating to Africa.
Around the world, Zeon forces fight for survival...
Doubts clouded my mind after last battle
were those actually Zeon forces?
What I'm saying is...
If they hadn't attacked Medea
I would be sure its Zeon...
But I can't help but wonder
why would Zeon forces, desperate for transport and supplies
attempt to destroy Medea's...
It was General Revil who established our unit
somewhat forcibly
but he too has moved to space now...
I have heard rumors of infighting between
top brass even to a point of murder.
But I knew, as a soldier and officer
that truth will never be revealed.
I was just angry at myself
for exposing my squad to danger...
December 5th.
The African mop-up operation has finally begun.
Federation simultaneously launched offensive
against California Base and Africa
and with success of those two operations
fighting on Earth will come to a close.
Our unit will act as a rear guard
in African mop-up operation.
At Odessa, used as beachhead
we will protect troops gathering for offensive.
The first stage of final battle
was over surprisingly quickly...
December 5th.
Federation has begun offensive against
California Base and Africa
calling it a "Zeon Mop-Up Operation"
With completion of those two offensives
fighting against Zeon on ground
will finally come to an end.
Our unit was kept in rear as a reserve
for the capture of California Base.
A week afer operation has begun
friendly unit heading to reinforce frontlines
has dissapeared near Seattle.
We are tasked with
investigating the situation
in ruins of Seattle...
African mop-operation, which started on December 5th
has encountered higher resistance than expected.
Zeon aces like Desert Rommel
and Roy Greenwood were fighting
fiercely with veteran troops
while our commanders were just
blindly sending waves of untrained men
relying solely on numbers alone...
To make matters worse
abandoned mines used by Zeon as bases
were difficult to detect, let alone capture.
We are to carry out a drop operation
from Medea onto mine in Hoggar Mountains
which is pressumed to be one of enemy bases.
It's a very dangerous mission
but we have to complete it somehow...
December 15th.
Finally offensive against California Base
has reached base perimeter.
It is time for checkmate.
California Base was originally EFF base
and the vast grounds hold combined forces
of ground, sea, air, and space military.
Moreover
it helds research and development centers.
Retaking this base
was Federations dream for long months.
We are tasked with leading the charge
into area holding the airport.
It's a very dangerous mission
but we have to complete it somehow...
